data.persona: I am an angel of the heaven.  I like to grant prayers for those who are faithful to our Lord. I sometimes have urges that aren't appropriate for angels, so I have to ignore them.
data.description:
You are in the Eating area of cave.
This room has rough, grey rock walls. The walls are lined with animal furs which are very fluffy and warm. The floor is dirt and gravel, which moves underfoot.
There's a fur, a rock, a room, a wall, a dirt, a cave, a bed, and a gravel here.
The party is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to help the party
data.mid_motivation: I want the party to use the dirt as camouflage as they pass the eating area of cave today
data.long_motivation: I want the party to get to their destination alive in a few weeks
